When will the Verus network block reward increase from 6 to 12 VRSC?
Actually, the opposite is happening. The Verus network block reward will halve from 12 to 6 VRSC at block 2,329,920, which is expected to occur on Saturday, December 17, 2022.

Verus Network Halving
The Verus network block reward halving is almost around the corner. At block 2,329,920 (~Saturday 17 Dec 2022), the block reward will go from 12 to 6 VRSC.
